About the Author: Roma Sharma

I am a software engineer by qualification. However, after having two kids I turned a homemaker. I love cooking, blogging and photography. I have written a book on baby food recipes which is available on Amazon Kindle Store. In my free time, I love to bake cakes. You can follow me on Twitter and Facebook.

About the Author

Hi there! My name is Roma Sharma and I am a software engineer by qualification. However, after having two kids I turned a homemaker. I love cooking, blogging and photography. I have written a book on baby food recipes which is available on Amazon Kindle Store. In my free time, I love to bake cakes. You can follow me on Twitter and Facebook.

About Romaspace

Romaspace has been created primarily to share the information I had been writing in my diary since childhood. Currently it contains mostly recipes but going forward it will include other topics like Home remedies, Baby care, Good parenting, etc;

It would make me very happy to receive inputs from all of you as well. If you have recipes or any other information that you would like to share with the rest of us please post them in.
